meanings.definition: Not adequately represented or present in a particular group or category.
meanings.sent1: The small town was underrepresented in the national news.
meanings.sent2: Women are often underrepresented in leadership positions.
meanings.sent3: The shy student felt underrepresented in the noisy classroom.
meanings.sent4: The unique perspective of the artist was underrepresented in mainstream galleries.
meanings.sent5: The diverse voices of the community were underrepresented in the decision-making process.

meanings.sent1: The minority group felt underrepresented in the city council.
meanings.sent2: The team was underrepresented in the final photo due to missing members.
meanings.sent3: The lonely tree in the forest seemed underrepresented among the tall oaks.
meanings.sent4: Her talent was underrepresented in the small local talent show.
meanings.sent5: The unique culture of the island was underrepresented in the tourist brochures.
